    Method
    Description

    void
    BatchRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function using the full training set in one step.
    <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>>
    void
    ChainedRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer)
    Trains by delegating to the topmost regime in the chain.
    <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>>
    void
    DumpNodesRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function with the wrapped regime and dumps the network nodes before and/or after training.
    <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>>
    void
    EpochRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function by repeatedly delegating to the wrapped regime for the configured number of epochs.
    <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>>
    void
    MiniBatchRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function by splitting the dataset into mini-batches of size BatchSizeConfigurable.getBatchSize() and delegating each batch to the underlying BatchRegime.
    <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>>
    void
    ObjectiveReportingRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function using the wrapped regime and reports the aggregated loss before and after training.
    <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>>
    void
    OnlineRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function in an online manner by iterating over each sample in the dataset and invoking the optimizer immediately for each one.
